committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the Alaska Natural Interest Lands Conservation Act to improve the management of Glacier Bay National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act to permit subsistence uses of Glacier Bay National Park by local residents where such uses are traditional and in accordance with subsistence use provisions of such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Alaska Natural Interest Lands Conservation Act to improve the management of Glacier Bay National Park, and for other purposes.
